Spoon Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2013-12-09  | Version: 1.0.0
Spoon Maven Plugin
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

spoon:spoon

Full name:

com.btmatthews.maven.plugins:spoon-maven-plugin:1.0.0:spoon

Description:

(no description)

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: compile+runtime.
  • Since version: 1.0.0.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: process-sources.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
inputSources File[] 1.0.0 A list of folders containing Java source files to be processed.
outputDirectory File 1.0.0 The Maven project descriptor.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/spooned.
processors String[] 1.0.0 A list of Spoon processors. A processor can be a fully qualified class name or the path for a Groovy script.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
source String 1.0.0 The Java compliance level.
Default value is: 1.5.
User property is: maven.compiler.source.

Parameter Details

inputSources:

A list of folders containing Java source files to be processed.
  • Type: java.io.File[]
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: Yes

outputDirectory:

The Maven project descriptor.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/spooned

processors:

A list of Spoon processors. A processor can be a fully qualified class name or the path for a Groovy script.
  • Type: java.lang.String[]
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: Yes

source:

The Java compliance level.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: No
  • User Property: maven.compiler.source
  • Default: 1.5
